course_description: This course focuses on anesthesia considerations and techniques for the pediatric and obstetric patient and enhances the student's knowledge and skills in preoperative patient evaluation, preanesthesia assessment, and preparation for administration of anesthesia, inductions, intraoperative management, emergence and postanesthesia management in this patient population.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 3930, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 8:30-11:30a; M 12-4p, Instructor: Cole/Branch, Status: Closed
